definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
(onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]
see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle

sentences.english: I don't know what that is.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道打啞謎是什麼。

sentences.english: My male friends never play double games and prefer to tell me the truth.
sentences.chinese: 我的男性朋友們從來不打啞謎，他們喜歡告訴我真相。

sentences.english: "You speak in riddles, learned sir," said the pale minister, glancing aside out of the window.
sentences.chinese: “你是在打啞謎，博學的先生，”牧師斜瞥着窗外說。

sentences.english: Sorry, I should stop speaking in riddles.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我應該停止打啞謎。
